name: remotion-superpowers
description: Full video production pipeline for Remotion — gives Claude eyes (video analysis), voice (TTS/voiceover), ears (music/SFX), and stock footage. One plugin to rule them all.

plugins.name: remotion-superpowers
plugins.description: Complete video production orchestrator for Remotion. Generates voiceovers (ElevenLabs TTS), background music (Suno), sound effects, stock footage (Pexels), and analyzes existing video (TwelveLabs) — all wired into Remotion compositions. One /create-video command produces a full video from a text prompt.
